Title: MakeBorderless
Description: Make Borderless is a small, simple application to control the display of borders on your windows applications. Great for games that run in windowed mode! Developed in C# under .NET 4.0
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Make Borderless is a small, simple application to control the display of borders on your windows applications. Great for games that run in windowed mode! Developed in C# under .NET 4.0

News

Softpedia Listing! (5/19/12)

It seems someone at Softpedia has listed Make Borderless on their site, and it's gotten 80+ downloads, how cool is that! Made my day for sure. I just found it on there, it was posted on the 8th apparently. Cool!

Link to SoftPedia

An Interesting use for Make Borderless (5/3/12)

In playing around with my new creation, I managed to get an idea. With full-screen flash windows (say, youtube), they detect in Make Borderless as a borderless window, and you can uncheck their box to actually GIVE a borderless window, a border! I thought it was fairly neat, and wanted to share that here on the project page! Have fun!
